Body:

12,081/- for medical expenses should be allowed as medical reimbursement.
The application was submitted under reference (1) on request. Allowable amount in this regard
12,011/- has been informed by the District Medical Officer as per reference (2).
According to the letter mentioned in reference (3), the state police chief reported to the government
done

2) Government has looked into the matter in detail. Administrative at Thrissur Range Office
1: 168766) Thrissur Jubilee Mission for the treatment of Assistant Mr. K.S.Abul Niaz
In Medical College Hospital from 06//043// 2021 to 01/09/2021
12,011// - 80% of Rs.
9,609//- (Rupees Nine Thousand Six Hundred and Nine Only) to be paid by the applicant
